response.overview: Shizuku lives a simple life, dominated by her love for stories and writing. One day she notices that all the library books she has have been previously checked out by the same person: 'Seiji Amasawa'.
response.title: Whisper of the Heart

titles.title: วันนั้น...วันไหน หัวใจจะเป็นสีชมพู

results.name: Whisper of the Heart - Studio Ghibli Fest 2024
Whisper of the Heart (Behind The USA Mic)
